settings.features_desc: Effective skin lightening ingredient for a decrease in hyperpigmentation, reducing brown spots and age spots, and melasma.
An anti-inflammatory that improves skin health and helps stimulate circulation.

settings.title_text: Kojic Acid, Alpha Arbutin & Licorice Root
settings.features_desc: Botanical skin brighteners that boost Hydroquinone's power.

settings.title: Features/Benefits
settings.ingredients:
Allantoin, Alpha Arbutin, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Azaleic Acid, BHT, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride,
Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dicetyl Phosphate, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Isopropyl Palmitate, Kojic Acid Dipalmitate, Malic Acid, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Ordenone, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Retinyl Palmitate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triethanolamine, Water/Aqua.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.description:
Cleanse the skin thoroughly before use. Cover the affected area
with a thin layer morning and night or as directed by your
healthcare practitioner. Use sunscreen daily. We recommend
VI SPF 50 Daily UV Defense Broad Spectrum Sunscreen.
